welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pratteln, a charming Swiss city known for its picturesque views and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No login or password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport France Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport France Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
